thoughts.text: I need to book my flight to Norway and ensure that I have all necessary travel documents and information. I should also research lodging and equipment rental options for my kayaking adventure.
thoughts.reasoning: Booking my flight and ensuring that I have all necessary travel documents and information will allow me to focus on planning the other aspects of my trip, such as lodging and equipment rental.
thoughts.plan:
- Book my flight to Norway
- Ensure that I have all necessary travel documents and information
- Research lodging and equipment rental options for my kayaking adventure
thoughts.criticism: I need to be more proactive in planning my adventures.
thoughts.speak: I need to book my flight to Norway and ensure that I have all necessary travel documents and information. I should also research lodging and equipment rental options for my kayaking adventure.

args.query: Lodging and equipment rental options for kayaking in Norway
